name: Stellar Deflect
description:
An ancient crystal, last of its kind, is hurtling through space, attracting nearby stars to its position.
Using a shield and mystical energies, you must defend the crystal from incoming projectiles at all costs.

We are the Regicide Collective, an indie game development group located in Melbourne, Australia.

You can find out more about us on;

Discord - https://discord.gg/by5MVAeKPk

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/TheRegicideCollective

Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/theregicidecollective

Website -  https://theregicidecollective.com/

Patreon -  https://www.patreon.com/TheRegicideCollective
